meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of a different form of a particular gene or protein.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the allotypic variations in the gene structure.
meanings.sent2: The allotypic differences in the protein composition were crucial for the research findings.
meanings.sent3: It was amusing to observe the allotypic patterns in the genetic makeup of the organisms.
meanings.sent4: Her allotypic traits shone brightly in the sea of genetic diversity.
meanings.sent5: The allotypic nature of the gene mutation made it stand out among the rest.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the different alleles of a gene that are present in different individuals of a species.
meanings.sent1: The allotypic variations among the individuals were fascinating to the biologist.
meanings.sent2: Allotypic characteristics can vary greatly within a single species.
meanings.sent3: The allotypic diversity in the population was a sight to behold.
meanings.sent4: His allotypic traits were like a colorful mosaic in the gene pool.
meanings.sent5: The allotypic differences between siblings were evident in their physical features.
